articles.title: MGM hack followed failed bid to rig slot machines, 'Scattered Spider' group claims - Financial Times
articles.description: Person claiming to represent cybercriminals explains techniques used to evade detection by casino resort company
articles.content: In a trick reminiscent of a heist movie, the hackers who allegedly breached the security at MGMs casinos this month originally planned to manipulate the software running the slot machines, and recrui… [+5766 chars]

articles.title: China issues warning to EU Commission over electric vehicle probe - Euronews
articles.description: China has warned the EU Commission that an investigation into electric vehicles could damage business relations and increase prices for European car buyers
articles.content:
